views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 7 - 10.

The Universal Thumbs Up/Down for streaming radio. With OneThumb you can assign one Activator gesture to thumbs up (or down) the current song.

Supported Players:
*Amazon Music With Prime
*Google Play Music
*iHeartRadio
*iTunes Radio
*Pandora
*Rhapsody
*Spotify
*YouTube Music
*Deezer

Added: Deezer Support Fixed: Music App in 10.x Spotify 7.4.0 Support Fixed: Spotify & YouTube Music latest updates causing crashes.
Removed: References to unsupported players.
Spite: /u/redwingblade
Updated: Amazon Prime Player for latest version. Fix: Pandora when the "allow Unthumb" option was enabled. Update: Spotify 5.6 Support
Discontinue: Songza and GrooveShark Support (Apps no longer maintained by original developers)
Pandora 7.x support.
Rebuilt to fix possibly crashes on 32 bit devices.
Customize the Status HUD with:
*Add Album Artwork
*Add Song Information
*Blurs
*Color
*Shape
*Animation

New: Activator action to check the current thumb state
New Supported Players:
*Amazon Music With Prime
*iHeartRadio
*YouTube Music
bBug Fix - Preference changes not taking effect until respring on devices < iOS8
+ Want to do another Activator event while you thumbs up a song? Now you can. The "Allow Multiple Activator Assignments" menu has been set to yes.

+ Landscape Mode
+ Fixed: That thing where you would save a preference but it didn't save right away.
+ General Bug Fixes
+ iOS8 support. +Pandora 1.5.1
+Better Pandora Version Checker
+BetterPSSLiderTableCell github.com/friggog /BetterPSSliderTableCell
+ Spotify 1.8 Support
Music App Notification Bug Fix
Optimization for all supported players
Pandora 5.5.1 Support * Support for Pandora 5.5
* Added: More Visuals

* Support for Spotify 1.5
* Fixed Logic: All Supported Apps. Only allow sending of thumbs events when the app allows it. (Some apps only allow thumbing when in the radio section)
* Added Thumbs Up onscreen display plus bonus control options. Now you can be sure your Thumbs Up went through and get the song info.
Fixed: Suppress original Activator gesture.
Fixed: Spotify - Do nothing when user not listening to the radio. This should clear up some confusion where users were "thumbing" a non radio station.
Changed: Spotify - Don't allow Thumbs Down if already Thumbs Up (Native app behavior).
Quenched: Appetite for destruction.

Added Grooveshark Support
New Option: Allow Unthumps Up back to neutral

Added Google Play Music Support

Added Rhapsody Support

Added Songza Support
